newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Crown says may have to wait on div.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Crown says may have to wait on div.

text.p: Melbourne Casino operator Crown Ltd said on Wednesday it may be prudent to wait for a full year's operation of its A$1.6 billion Southbank entertainment and casino complex before paying a dividend.

"I would think it would be probably prudent to have 12 months of operation at Southbank before we considered that," Crown chairman Lloyd Williams told the annual meeting, when asked when the company would pay its first dividend.
Crown, which currently operates a temporary casino, has said it intends to open the complex around February 1997.
Crown, 37 percent owned by Hudson Conway Ltd, did not pay a dividend in the 1995/96 year ending June 30.
